resources.string: Application written in Kotlin and C++. It is used to inject payloads on the Nintendo Switch.
Name or URL should not be empty!
Error occurred during downloading %1$s payload. Check you connection or typos in URL.
Check if you Nintendo Switch is hackable using your unit\'s serial number

First you need to find a cable to connect your device to the Nintendo Switch. For proper work, this should be a cable that is designed for data transmission, not just for charging.\n\nIt is advisable to use an A-to-C cable and an USB OTG adapter.

In the \u0022Payloads\u0022 category, click the \u0022+\u0022 button to select preloaded payload from your device\'s storage. Or simply transfer your payload to the Rekado folder in the device\'s memory.\n\nOr you can use the bundled payloads (SX Loader/ReiNX/Hekate)
Enter your Nintendo Switch into RCM mode in any convenient way. \n\nYour Nintendo Switch will power on by itself when plugged in, be sure to hold VOLUME +.
Connect the device to the Nintendo Switch and allow permission for the USB access if necessary. Wait unit payloads chooser dialog will be opened and select which one you want to load.
You can support the development of the application by buying me a coffee.
Remove all added payloads except bundled (SX Loader/ReiNX/Hekate)
Color used to tint UI elements
Settings have been changed. Please, restart for the change to take effect. \n\nRestart the app now?
Rekado need this permission to get payload files from your device\'s storage.
Could not access device\'s storage. Try to get permission again.
Are you sure you want to delete payloads?

Serials beginning with XAW1
XAW10000000000 - XAW10074000000: Not patched
XAW10075000000 - XAW10120000000: Possibly patched
XAW10120000000 and higher: Patched

Serials beginning with XAW4
XAW40000000000 - XAW40011000000: Not patched
XAW40011000000 - XAW40012000000: Possibly patched
XAW40012000000 and higher: Patched

Serials beginning with XAW7
XAW70000000000 - XAW70017800000: Not patched
XAW70017800000 - XAW70030000000: Possibly patched
XAW70030000000 and higher: Patched

Serials beginning with XAJ1
XAJ10000000000 - XAJ10020000000: Not patched
XAJ10020000000 - XAJ10030000000: Possibly patched
XAJ10030000000 and higher: Patched

Serials beginning with XAJ4
XAJ40000000000 - XAJ40046000000: Not patched
XAJ40046000000 - XAJ40060000000: Possibly patched
XAJ40060000000 and higher: Patched

Serials beginning with XAJ7
XAJ70000000000 - XAJ70040000000: Not patched
XAJ70040000000 - XAJ70050000000: Possibly patched
XAJ70050000000 and higher: Patched

Serials beginning with XAW9
Refurbished units directly from Nintendo, no information, but very possible all of them are patched.
Serials beginning with XAK\nNo information available, since those are only sold in Korea.
Maximum length of the serial number is 14 characters!
Are you sure this is correct payload file?
